body:
I really don't have anything interesting to say about this release. How disappointing.

- Fixed mechs on mobile being unusable (and it only took 20 individual bug reports!)
- Fixed routers accepting more items than they should
- Fixed crash when running game with Java 10
- Fixed instant building after game reload
- Fixed many various crashes related to multithreading
- Fixed some sectors completing instantly
- Fixed flying units blocking construction
- Fixed crashes related to pumps
- Fixed sector state not syncing in multiplayer at all
- Fixed block breaking selection being offset when a 2x2 block is selected
- Fixed not being able to shoot while mining [Mobile]
- Fixed some typos
- Fixed Revenant unit never shooting (it's still terrible though)
- Fixed not being able to load any map after a corrupted map was loaded
- Fixed connecting to offline servers freezing the game
- Fixed pump placement being inconsistent [Contributed by Sonnicon]
- Fixed physics being more terrible than usual
- Fixed units moving higher and low/high TPS
- Fixed multiblocks not outputting to bridges after save reload
- Fixed... some other things
- Improved map previews
- Renamed oil and phase matter
- Added descriptions for nearly all blocks [Contributed by Timmeey86]
- Added new font with proper support for all in-game languages and cAsE sEnSiTiViTy
- Added new UI palette
- Added small lakes to world generation
- Added local saving of crashes [Desktop]
- Added server logs [Server]
- Added new sector selection screen
- Added localized/specific text for most errors
- Added chained storage mechanic for cores
- Added timestamps to output [Contributed by Luxray5474, Server]
- Added label to command center commands [Contributed by Sonnicon]
- Made alpha drones only appear when shooting
- Made drones repair any damaged block on the map, regardless of distance
- Made core accept any item again
- Made power beam sprites less intrusive (...and less visually appealing)
- Made storage blocks have individual item buffers
- Re-scaled 'max power' on a blocks, changed to 'base power' and made many stats display as percentages
- Removed many useless or unnecessary commands [Server] 
- Removed tutorial due to incoming block changes
name: 4.0 Build 59 - Unstable Alpha
